Uses of Interface
com.tangosol.util.TransactionMap.Validator

  • Packages that use TransactionMap.Validator 
    Package Description
    com.tangosol.run.jca
    Contains classes providing Java 2 Connector Architecture functionality.
    com.tangosol.util
    Contains various generic utilities.

    • Uses of TransactionMap.Validator in com.tangosol.run.jca

      Classes in com.tangosol.run.jca that implement TransactionMap.Validator 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  SimpleValidator
      Simple generic Validator implementation that uses hashCode values for the enlisted resources to resolve optimistic transaction conflicts.
